scripts.translate: npm run build && npm run build:pot && ./node_modules/.bin/po2json ./inc/vk-blocks/languages/vk-blocks-ja.po ./inc/vk-blocks/languages/vk-blocks-ja-vk-blocks-build-js.json -f jed
scripts.lint: wp-scripts format-js src/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/ --fix
scripts.lint:alert: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/alert && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/alert --fix
scripts.lint:pr-content: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/pr-content/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/pr-content/ --fix
scripts.lint:faq2: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq2 && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq2 --fix
scripts.lint:faq2-q: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq2-q && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq2-q --fix
scripts.lint:faq2-a: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq2-a && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq2-a --fix
scripts.lint:balloon: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/balloon && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/balloon --fix
scripts.lint:faq: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/faq && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/faq --fix

scripts.lint:page-content: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/page-content && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/page-content --fix
scripts.lint:flow: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/flow && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/flow --fix

scripts.lint:select-post-list: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/select-post-list && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/select-post-list --fix
scripts.lint:select-post-list-item: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/select-post-list-item && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/select-post-list-item --fix
scripts.lint:child-page: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/child-page && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/child-page --fix
scripts.lint:border-box: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/border-box && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/border-box --fix
scripts.lint:spacer: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/spacer && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/spacer --fix
scripts.lint:button: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/button && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/button --fix
scripts.lint:pr-blocks: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/pr-blocks/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/pr-blocks/ --fix
scripts.lint:timeline: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline --fix
scripts.lint:timeline-item: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline-item && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/timeline-item --fix
scripts.lint:table-of-contents-new: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/table-of-contents-new && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/table-of-contents-new --fix
scripts.lint:outer: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/outer && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/outer --fix
scripts.lint:card: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/card && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/card --fix
scripts.lint:card-item: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/card-item && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/card-item --fix
scripts.lint:icon-card: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/icon-card && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/icon-card --fix
scripts.lint:icon-card-item: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/icon-card-item && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/icon-card-item --fix

scripts.lint:step-item: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/step-item && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/step-item --fix
scripts.lint:slider: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/slider && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/slider --fix
scripts.lint:slider-item: wp-scripts format-js src/blocks/_pro/slider-item && wp-scripts lint-js src/blocks/_pro/slider-item --fix
scripts.lint:extensions: wp-scripts format-js src/extensions/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/extensions/ --fix
scripts.lint:components: wp-scripts format-js src/components/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/components/ --fix
scripts.lint:utils: wp-scripts format-js src/utils && wp-scripts lint-js src/utils --fix
scripts.fixtures:regenerate: npm run build && npm run fixtures:clean && npm run fixtures:generate
scripts.show:savedVersion: bash -c 'npm run cli wp post meta get $0 _vkb_saved_block_version'
scripts.update:savedVersion: bash -c 'npm run cli wp post meta update $0 _vkb_saved_block_version $1'
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules/ && npm install && npm run build
